overview: Akyra Pagoulatos, vice president of world-wide sales at SpectraLinear, brings more than 15 years of experience in sales and business development in the semiconductor industry. Prior to joining SpectraLinear in 2009, Akyra was vice president of worldwide sales and business development for Analogix Semiconductor, a mixed signal company where he helped establish their worldwide sales infrastructure. In a similar position with ABT, he helped establish the company as a leading edge video processing semiconductor supplier and at Zoranâ„¢, as vice president of world-wide sales and general manager of the IP business unit, he established a leading position across Zoran’s consumer semiconductors solutions. He served as general Manager for a number of consumer and PC groups with royal Philips Electronics and Sony Corporation. Akyra holds a B.S. degree from New York Institute of Technology.
